content: new free crochet pattern - wishwoven good luck charm there is long lore and tradition surrounding the wishbone but it always surrounds luck whether earliest roman history as they rubbed it making a wish to it being called a merrythought and being crocheted into good luck thimble holders or now as i created this free pattern for you to wear a talisman of good luck around your neck or hanging from your favorite window it s a wild kitchen green witchy token for you from me sending you merry thoughts crochetverse a easter egg too a tiny peak at a year s long of work pattern release is coming tomorrow and i m wearing it here free on the blog only at
